title: Fight On! Yeo Manager
description:
A woman manager in a company filled with all the yaoi clichés. All her coworkers are men, gay and very incompetent at work, most likely because they are more concerned about their "secret" dating. To add in - her superior that looks like a broom with glasses keeping himself busy all day round only by yelling at her for any little thing!
Is she the only one who actually work in this company?!

Постоянные злоключения женщины, работающей в компании, битком набитой страстными геями.
